类型: Size: 24 MonthsColor: Wolf PackNumber of Items: 1
评论详情: These pajamas are perfect for winter. My son just turned 16m and is fitting the 24m pj's with some room to grow. He runs hot at night (we keep our house at 68-69 degrees) and these allow for him to not overheat because his body heat doesn't stay trapped like with fleece pj's. But they are also warm, and as a little guy who likes to kick his blankets off, his feet will not get cold because of the footed pajamas. These pajamas are stretchy, soft, not see through, have padded footsies, and work for play too. I haven't had any issues with the feet or other areas getting holes, and he's a very active toddler. There is only one zipper from the neck area not from the bottom which works for us because his legs have always been to long to change with the double zipper pjs. They are not fold over hand cuff pajamas. The patterns are adorable, it's 100 percent cotton, it seems they have some new patterns with the seasons, the prices are good on sale or if u just need 1 at a time, just try them out. My only problem is they stop at 24 months 💔. It would be amazing if these went up to 5 y.o.

类型: Size: 24 MonthsColor: Celestial MoonNumber of Items: 1
评论详情: I bought this pair of PJs for my 2 year old as we love the burts bees clothes. They’re always so soft and high quality. They’re also usually pretty expensive too and are $15 a pair. The boy PJs went on sale during cyber week and I got this pair for $7 and I bought others that I thought could be worn by both girls and boys as well. I love this particular pattern, they’re soft, like Burt’s bees clothes usually are, and the feet have the rubber padding on the bottom for slip resistance. The material is decently thick and has provided lots of warmth during these colder winter nights. The PJs have also stayed the same print quality throughout a dozen washes so far and still look as though we just bought them. The size was spot on and fit her snugly and perfectly but yet also had some extra foot room. The material also stretches nicely. Overall I highly recommend, even at the $15 price. These are great quality pjs and I look forward to more patterns!

I absolutely love Burt's Bees however since we've moved up in size to 12m, there has been such a difference in quality. I mostly order the footed pajamas and and have had to send a few back while others are great. The one I received yesterday with the polar bears, the material was visibly different on the zipper leg than the other, it was also much tighter. The football one was so tight I could not get it on my baby. The brown stripped and the campfire ones are amazing and we alternate between those two during the week.  All of these are the same size, brand, and come from the same group of ordering. Flustered to say the least.

Love the print options of these fun baby jammies and that they have skid resistant bottoms for my new little walker.  They are snug meeting safety requirements but also stretchy offering ease of movement.Only thing that would have made these jammies better is a double zipper for ease of diaper changing.  Definitively will purchase this brand again.
